page.title: 07THE POLICE STATION
page.content: The original Police Station was over the road at Harp Cottage.The present station is about 30 years old.P.C. Headon and his family have been living here for 2 years.P.C.Headon works an 8 hour shift and when he is off duty he enjoys playing golf and playing with his son,Joe.He has a Police Car,a white Metro and a radio.He uses his truncheon to break windows and he has a whistle, note-book and a torch.In his house there is an office with essential equipment.P.C.Headon's area covers Bredenbury, Whitbourne, Thornbury, Edwyn Ralph and Collington. He dislikes telling people sad news. . CLASS 1
